tests.name: Test 1: Structured Epic Narrative with Cultural Constraints
tests.description: Create epic narrative following specific structural and cultural constraints

messages.content: You are an expert cultural storyteller specializing in cross-cultural narrative traditions with deep respect for indigenous and traditional forms. You excel at following complex creative constraints while maintaining cultural authenticity.

Create a 300-word epic narrative opening that integrates these requirements:

STRUCTURAL CONSTRAINTS:
• Three-act structure with clear setup/conflict/resolution preview
• Multiple character perspectives (minimum 3 distinct voices)
• Cyclical time narrative (past/present/future interconnected)
• Embedded wisdom teaching within the story

CULTURAL REQUIREMENTS:
• Draw from two distinct cultural epic traditions (specify which)
• Maintain authentic cultural voice and worldview for each tradition
• Show respectful cultural synthesis rather than appropriation
• Include traditional narrative devices from both cultures

OUTPUT FORMAT:
• Opening paragraph establishing cultural context
• Character introduction with cultural authenticity
• Conflict preview with cross-cultural dimensions
• Closing that promises resolution through cultural understanding
